E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/16/1989
Subject: Progress of Brian D. Johnson
Dear Sir,
Brian D. Johnson has nothing more to prove at A Peoria Chiefs!
He has an AVG of .355 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 6/21/1989
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Kirby Puckett
